name: Crazy Oafish Ultra Blocks: Big Sale
description: A massive sale is coming, which means unique bonus offers and huge discounts on amazing products that you've been dreaming of all year! But then there are...madness crowds. How does one not go crazy in all this?!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.1GHz Intel dual-core and above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD5000 with minimum 512MB VRAM and Pixel Shader 3.0 support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.4 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 3.6 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7990 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
